desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有蔚蓝档案的活动。
desc.zh_tw: 本頁列出所有蔚藍檔案的活動。

name.zh_tw: 夏萊的快樂♡情人節巡邏
name.zh_cn_jp: 夏莱的快乐♡情人节巡逻
name.zh_cn_tw: 夏莱的快乐♡情人节巡逻
name.zh_cn_cn: 夏莱的快乐♡情人节巡逻

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.thai: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.ko: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_tw: 奇普托斯迎來了情人節！桐乃和吹雪帶著老師一起在如往年般盛大的活動會場巡邏。少女們的戀情，決勝負的一天開始了！
desc.zh_cn_jp: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！桐乃和吹雪带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的热情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake! But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.jp: An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake! But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.thai: An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake! But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.ko: An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake! But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.zh_tw: 三一重要的經典變得四分五裂了！為了復原經典，日向與老師在三一各處東奔西跑。究竟能不能在典禮開始前完成復原呢！？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三一重要的经典变得四分五裂了！为了复原经典，日向与老师在三一各处东奔西跑。究竟能不能在典礼开始前完成复原呢！？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三一重要的经典变得四分五裂了！为了复原经典，日向与老师在三一各处东奔西跑。究竟能不能在典礼开始前完成复原呢！？

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.thai: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.ko: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_tw: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄輪大祭～
name.zh_cn_jp: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～
name.zh_cn_tw: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～
name.zh_cn_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.thai: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.ko: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_tw: 奇普托斯運動大會「晄輪大祭」終於開始了。各個學園齊聚一堂，在相互競爭的慶典背後，暗藏著波濤洶湧……究竟，勝利女神會向哪個學園露出微笑呢？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 奇普托斯运动大会“晄轮大祭”终于开始了。各个学园齐集一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 奇普托斯运动大会“晄轮大祭”终于开始了。各个学园齐集一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会“晄轮大祭”终于开始了。各个学园齐集一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？
